Goal Representation:
Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Locate the bathroom sink.', '2. Clean the bathroom sink directly.']

behavior locate_bathroom_sink():
    body:
        foreach room: item:
            if is_bathroom(room):
                foreach o: item:
                    if is_sink(o) and inside(o, room) and not visited(o):
                        observe(o, "Determine if this sink is the bathroom sink")

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        locate_bathroom_sink()

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Clean the sink bowl and basin area.', '2. Clean the faucet and handles.']

behavior clean_sink_bowl_and_basin_area(sink: item):
    body:
        achieve clean(sink)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink)
        clean_sink_bowl_and_basin_area(sink)
